snippet: The owner of the Cleveland Browns, Randy Lerner, reached a deal to sell the club to Jimmy Haslam III, a truck-stop magnate who is the brother of the Tennessee governor and a minority stockholder in the rival Pittsburgh Steelers, the Browns’...
abstract: Cleveland Browns owner Randy Lerner reaches deal to sell the club to Jimmy Haslam III, minority stockholder in the team's rival Pittsburgh Steelers; other NFL news noted.
lead_paragraph: The owner of the Cleveland Browns, Randy Lerner, reached a deal to sell the club to Jimmy Haslam III, a truck-stop magnate who is the brother of the Tennessee governor and a minority stockholder in the rival Pittsburgh Steelers, the Browns’ president, Mike Holmgren, said.

headline.main: Browns’ Owner Reaches Deal to Sell the Team
headline.print_headline: Browns’ Owner Reaches Deal to Sell the Team
